Package bacnet.datamodel.dataset

Class NGS

java.lang.Object
bacnet.datamodel.dataset.OmicsData
bacnet.datamodel.dataset.NGS
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class NGS extends OmicsData implements Serializable
Class for manipulating various RNASeq data, herited from ExpressionData
double[] value is of genome size, when ones want to see RNAseq expression at a certain bp position, just extract values[bpposition]
Need to be loaded first, and unlog has RNASeq will be logged for display when convert in the platform
Author:
UIBC
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • load

      public void load()
      Load information on the datasets: name, date, note, stat, etc ... The path for data loading will be: PATH_STREAMING+this.getName()+"_"chromoID+"Info"+this.EXTENSION;

    • read

      public void read()
      Load the entire TranscriptomeData
      Throws:
      IOException

    • save

      public void save(boolean saveValues)
      Save stat and values in two separate files
      Saving is done via DataStream to allow streaming reading
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getUnlogValue

      public double getUnlogValue(int bpPosition, String chromoID)
      Get value at a certain base pair position and unlog it by calculating 2^value
      It works faster if data has been already loaded by this.read() or this.read(from,to)

    • convert

      public void convert(NGS data, boolean logTransformed)
      Run the conversion of wigfiles
      Parameters:
      data -
      logTransformed -

    • convertWigFile

      public void convertWigFile(NGS data, boolean logTransformed)
      WIG file are common RNASeq data
      Calculate first the MEDIAN value of the different replicates ad then log2 transform and save the NGS data Two columns:
    • one for the base pair position
    • one for the coverage value
      • Parameters:
      rawDataPath -
      genome -

    • compare

      public NGS compare(NGS data2, boolean calcData)
      Create RNASeq data from the comparison of this one and data2
      Parameters:
      data2 -
      calcData - true if we want to calculate the data
      Returns:
      Throws:
      IOException

    • readWIGChromo

      public ArrayList<String> readWIGChromo(String fileName, String chromoName, Genome genome)
      Will read your wig file and parse it to BACNET
      ONLY WIG FILE WITH variableStep and raw format are accepted No fixedStep format
      Parameters:
      fileName -
      chromoName -
      Returns:
      list of position and the corresponding coverage on chromoName chromosome
